TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAttachedPropertyStore

summary.span: 表示设置了可附加成员的对象的可附加成员存储。

span.span: Represents an attachable member store for an object where attachable members are set.

summary.span: 随后可使用 引用此可附加成员存储。

span.span: This attachable member store can then be referenced with .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可附加成员通常作为可附加的属性实现和使用。An attachable member is typically implemented and used as an attachable property. 术语 "可附加成员" 为技术还定义了可附加事件的系统提供了一种可能性。The term "attachable member" provides for the possibility that a technology also defines a system for attachable events. 作为属性存储区中的项，可附加事件存储对通过可附加成员使用情况分配的处理程序的引用。As an item in a property store, an attachable event stores a reference to the handler that is assigned through attachable member usage. XAML 中可附加的事件可以使用与可附加属性相同的存储，即使可附加事件不是真正成为基础类型系统的属性或在实际使用时也是如此。An attachable event in XAML can use the same store as the attachable properties do, even if the attachable event is not truly a property to the underlying type system or as it is considered in real-world use.

param.span: 该数组为泛型数组，应以无维度方式传递，并且应具有 和 的组件。

span.span: The array is a generic array, should be passed undimensioned, and should have components of and .
The source index where copying should begin.

summary.span: 从此可附加成员存储区中复制所有可附加成员/值对，并将它们复制到目标数组中。

span.span: Copies all attachable member/value pairs from this attachable member store into a destination array.

summary.span: 获取此可附加成员存储中的可附加成员条目的计数。

span.span: Gets the count of the attachable member entries in this attachable member store.

value.span: 存储中条目的整数计数。

span.span: The integer count of entries in the store.

span.span: Removes the entry for the specified attachable member from this attachable member store.

returns.span: 如果在存储中找到了 的可附加成员条目并已将其移除，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if an attachable member entry for was found in the store and removed; otherwise, .

abstract member SetProperty : System.Xaml.AttachableMemberIdentifier * obj -> unit

param.name: attachableMemberIdentifier
param.span: 要设置的可附加成员条目的 XAML 类型系统标识符。

span.span: The XAML type system identifier for the attachable member entry to set.

summary.span: 设置指定存储中的指定可附加成员的值。

span.span: Sets a value for the specified attachable member in the specified store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果特定的可附加成员已存在，则实现不应引发异常。An implementation should not throw an exception if the specific attachable member already exists. 如果成员已存在，则实现应使用覆盖任何现有值 `value` 。If a member already exists, the implementation should overwrite any existing value with `value`.

abstract member TryGetProperty : System.Xaml.AttachableMemberIdentifier * obj -> bool

param.name: attachableMemberIdentifier
param.span: 要获取的可附加成员条目的 XAML 类型系统标识符。

span.span: The XAML type system identifier for the attachable member entry to get.

param.name: value
param.span: 当此方法返回时，如果 存在于存储中并且具有值，则会包含值的目标对象。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the destination object for the value if exists in the store and has a value.

summary.span: 尝试获取指定存储中的指定可附加成员的值。

span.span: Attempts to get a value for the specified attachable member in the specified store.

returns.span: 如果在存储中找到了 的可附加成员条目，并且值已传递到 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if an attachable member entry for was found in the store and a value was posted to ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果特定的可附加成员不在存储区中，则实现不应引发异常。An implementation should not throw an exception if the specific attachable member is not located in the store.
